H0.text: Get rid of wastes is what skunks spray a strong‑smelling liquid to.

H1.text: Attract prey is what skunks spray a strong‑smelling liquid to.

H2.text: Defend themselves is what skunks achieve by spraying a strong‑smelling liquid.

H3.text: Help nearby plants grow is the purpose of skunks spraying a strong‑smelling liquid.

A4.text: A skunk's spray is powerful enough to ward off bears and other potential attackers.
